pages.title: Config
pages.text:
Here is a list of all config options found in the mod.

Note: Most config options are found in saves/WorldName/serverconfig/antsportation-server.toml

pages.title: Server Config
pages.text:
#Note: boxing machines refers to boxers / unboxers
[boxing]
#If boxing machines should use energy (Forge Energy)
useEnergy = $(scfg/boxing.useEnergy)
#The amount of energy boxing machines can store.
#Range: > 1
energyCapacity = $(scfg/boxing.energyCapacity)

pages.title: Server Config
pages.text:
#How many ticks each speed upgrade will reduce from the needed progress of boxing machines.
#Range: > 1
upgradeReduction = $(scfg/boxing.upgradeReduction)
#How much speed upgrades will increase the energy usage of boxing machines.
#Range: > 1
upgradeEnergyUsage = $(scfg/boxing.upgradeEnergyUsage)

pages.title: Server Config
pages.text:
#How much ticks boxing machines will need per process.
#Range: > 1
baseNeededTicks = $(scfg/boxing.baseNeededTicks)
#How much energy boxing machines will use per tick, by default.
#Range: > 1
baseUsedEnergy = $(scfg/boxing.baseUsedEnergy)

pages.title: Server Config: Ants
pages.text:
[ants]
#The delay in ticks until Ant Hills will spawn a new Worker Ant.
#Range: 1 ~ 100000
hillSpawnDelay = $(scfg/ants.hillSpawnDelay)
#The delay in ticks before an Ant Nest will attempt to push / pull into a hill.
#Range: 1 ~ 100000
nestIORate = $(scfg/ants.nestIORate)
#If the only items that can be transported directly by ants are the ones in the 'antsportation:ant_transportable' tag.

pages.title: Server Config: Ants
pages.text:
#If 'false', all items can be transported directly by ants.
onlyTransportableItems = $(scfg/ants.onlyTransportableItems)
#If Chunk Loading Markers should be enabled.
chunkloadingMarkers = $(scfg/ants.chunkloadingMarkers)
